tips.tip1: Paste any video URL to start

history.title: Download History
history.subtitle: View and manage your past downloads
history.emptyDesc: Your download history will appear here
history.clearConfirmDesc: This will remove all download history. This action cannot be undone.

privacy.title: Your privacy matters.
privacy.description: Download history is stored locally on your device only. We never collect, track, or send your data anywhere.

discord.title: Discord Webhook
discord.description: Get download notifications in your Discord server

pwa.title: Install App
pwa.androidDesc: Use Chrome browser for best experience. Tap menu (‚ãÆ) ‚Üí "Add to Home screen" or "Install app".

cookies.title: Platform Cookies
cookies.priority: Priority: Your cookie ‚Üí Admin cookie ‚Üí Guest mode
cookies.adminNote: Admin cookies are pre-configured for most platforms.
cookies.howToGetDesc: Install Cookie Editor extension ‚Üí Go to platform ‚Üí Click extension ‚Üí Export as Header String
cookies.warningDesc: Using cookies may violate platform ToS. Risk includes shadow ban to permanent ban.

storage.title: Data & Storage
storage.skipCacheDesc: Bypass Redis cache for fresh results

backup.title: Full Backup
backup.description: Export as ZIP containing history.json + settings.json. Import will merge data.
backup.restoreConfirmDesc: This will restore history and settings. Duplicates will be skipped.

clear.cookiesDesc: This will remove all saved platform cookies.
clear.localStorageDesc: This will remove themes and settings.
clear.historyCacheDesc: This will remove all download history and cached results.
clear.allDesc: All cookies, settings, and cache will be deleted.

story.title: The Story
story.p1: I used to use Telegram bots to download videos from social media. Convenient - just send a link, wait a bit, done.
story.p2: But over time, I got frustrated... üò§
story.p3: So I thought: "Why not build my own?"
story.p4: And DownAria was born ‚Äî same functionality, but no limits, no queue, and privacy-friendly. üöÄ

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.defaultMessage: üîß DownAria is under maintenance. Please try again later.
maintenance.footer: We're working hard to improve your experience. Thanks for your patience!

install.title: Install DownAria
install.subtitle: Get the full app experience on your device
install.readyToUse: DownAria is ready to use on your device

ios.title: Install on iOS
ios.step1: Tap the Share button in Safari
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
ios.note: Make sure you're using Safari browser

android.title: Install on Android
android.step1: Tap the menu button (‚ãÆ) in Chrome
android.step2: Tap "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"
android.note: Works best with Chrome or Samsung Internet

desktop.title: Install on Desktop
desktop.step1: Look for the install icon (‚äï) in the address bar
desktop.step3: The app will open in its own window
desktop.note: Supported in Chrome, Edge, and other Chromium browsers

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.suggestion: Try downloading a video from the homepage

errors.pasteHint: Tap here and press Ctrl+V (or long-press ‚Üí Paste)

checkpointRequired.title: üö´ Cookie Blocked
checkpointRequired.message: Facebook detected unusual activity on the admin cookie.
checkpointRequired.detail: The account may be shadow banned or requires verification.
checkpointRequired.hint: Try adding your own cookie in Settings, or wait for admin to update.

maintenanceError.title: üîß Under Maintenance
maintenanceError.message: We're working on improvements. Check back soon!

extractionFailed.title: Extraction Failed
extractionFailed.withCookie: ‚ö†Ô∏è Cookie is set but extraction still failed.
extractionFailed.hint: Try: Refresh cookie, use HTML extractor in Advanced, or the post may be restricted.

fetchFailedPrivate.title: Failed to Fetch
fetchFailedPrivate.hint: This content may be private. Add your cookie in Settings to access.

weiboCookie.title: Weibo Cookie Required
weiboCookie.message: Weibo requires a cookie to access videos.
weiboCookie.expired: ‚ö†Ô∏è Your previous cookie has expired or not set.
weiboCookie.hint: Go to Settings ‚Üí Weibo and paste a new guest cookie.

advanced.title: Advanced Tools
advanced.subtitle: Power user features - extractors and tools

warning.title: Experimental:
warning.message: These tools are for advanced users. Use responsibly.

playground.title: API Playground
playground.description: Test the download API without authentication. Rate limited to {limit} requests/2 minutes.

api.testBrowserHint: Paste this in browser address bar to see JSON response
api.postHint: For programmatic use - send URL in request body
api.noKeyRequired: No API key required ‚Ä¢ GET /api = 15/min ‚Ä¢ POST /api/playground = 5/2min

errors.invalidProtocol: URL must start with http:// or https://
errors.unsupportedPlatform: Unsupported platform. Try Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, or Weibo

fbHtml.title: Facebook HTML Extractor
fbHtml.description: Extract videos from private posts via page source
fbHtml.sourceHint: Open in new tab ‚Üí Ctrl+A ‚Üí Ctrl+C
fbHtml.pasteHint: Tip: If paste button doesn't work, manually paste (Ctrl+V) into the box above
fbHtml.htmlPlaceholder: Paste the entire HTML source code here (Ctrl+V)...
